remarks: Lemma for ~ axdc2 .  We construct a relation ` R ` based on ` F ` such that ` x R y ` iff ` y e. ( F `` x ) ` , and show that the "function" described by ~ ax-dc can be restricted so that it is a real function (since the stated properties only show that it is the superset of a function).
